reviews.text: This is gold. In flavor and color. They always said, ‚Äúif your strawberry liquid isn‚Äôt yellow than it wrong‚Äù and god damn is this yellow. Good work.
This is good and gets a badge of strawberry-blind-friendly! Way better than I expected, great work.
Really good mixed again after i finished off the first bottle.
